snippet: The network continues to treat her comments as less-than-official positioning for the future.
abstract: Sharon Osbourne repeats her threats to leave NBC's America's Got Talent, though the network continues to treat her comments as less-than-official positioning for the future; Osbourne is in a dispute involving her son Jack, who was in discussions to appear in another NBC reality competition before he was diagnosed with multiple sclerosis.
lead_paragraph: The network continues to treat her comments as less-than-official positioning for the future.

headline.main: Sharon Osbourne Repeats Threat to Quit NBC Show
headline.print_headline: Sharon Osbourne Repeats Threat to Quit NBC Show
